Title: No More Blood
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Morenike Balogun, Erika Harrison (executive story editor), Fernanda Coppel (story editor), Morenike Balogun (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Alfred Enoch, Jack Falahee
Plot: An unlikely source of help is sought by Bonnie and Annalise, creating further tension amongst the Keating 5. Meanwhile, Annalise's new client offers a great deal of surprise.
